Articles.Content:
i'm looking for some good rover mods that focus on rover parts and their construction, is anyone able to point me to such a mod that's updated for 1.0.4?

i already know about [http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/87546-0-24-Rovers-And-Roadsters-v0-1-New-Parts-for-Small-Ground-Vehicles](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/87546-0-24-Rovers-And-Roadsters-v0-1-New-Parts-for-Small-Ground-Vehicles)

but those are really only practical for in atmo excursions.

Have a look at the library:

[http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/55401-Community-Mods-and-Plugins-Library](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/55401-Community-Mods-and-Plugins-Library)

Kerbal Foundries has wheels, tracks etc

Rovers are a bit limited...

I'm hunting for a suspension mod, or guide...

[USI Exploration Pack](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/86695)

[ASET rovers](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/94947)

[Kerbal Foundries](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/84102)

and some "rovers" that are really cars:

[Lolex Car mod](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/128468)

[Kerdi Auto](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/129797)

[Muscle Car Parts](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/109559)

- - - Updated - - -

oh and of course [Rover Wheel Sounds](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/55104)... VVVVVVRRRRRRRRRRROOOOM!!!
